hero.subtitle: I develop bots, automations, and custom backends that do the work for you, connect services, and simplify processes.
hero.paragraph1: I love creating smart solutions that automate tasks.
hero.paragraph2: They connect services and do the work for you.
hero.paragraph3: I combine creativity and logic to solve real problems.
hero.paragraph5: Although my strength is backend and automation, I can also handle frontend.

services.kicker: What can I do for you?
services.title: Services & Solutions

backend.title: Need a custom backend for your store?
backend.description: I build all the logic: databases, payments, social login, rewards system, and admin panel.

bots.title: Need a smart or automated bot?
bots.description: I design custom bots for WhatsApp, websites, or online stores. They can work with or without AI depending on your needs.

dashboard.title: Need a personalized dashboard?
dashboard.description: I create web dashboards to monitor data, manage bots, or visualize reports.

integrations.title: Need to connect external services?
integrations.description: I integrate services like Google Sheets, email, WhatsApp, web APIs, and automate your processes.

automation.title: Need to automate your processes?
automation.description: Automate your workflows with bots, APIs, or integrations. I connect and optimize tasks using tools like Google Sheets, email, and more.

bot.title: AI Bot for Customer Service
bot.description: Smart bot with OpenAI and online store connection to automate queries, orders, and more.

fullbackend.title: Full Backend with FastAPI
fullbackend.description: Professional backend with authentication, rewards system, admin panel, and PostgreSQL database. Demo not available yet.

panel.title: Custom Admin Panel
panel.description: Custom web panel to manage products, orders, rewards, and internal tools. Currently in development.

voiceclone.title: Voice Cloning Web
voiceclone.description: Web project focused on AI-powered voice cloning, part of the Dubloop ecosystem. Currently in progress.

form.title: Contact Form
form.description: Form connected to Formspree with custom design, animations, and user feedback.
